Text: IT Customer Satisfaction SurveyPST Customer Support Group is committed to continuous improvement of our service This survey focuses on the services you receive from the Resolution Center Desktop Support Hardware and System Access Support In order to improve we need to hear from you This survey should only take about to minutes to complete Your input is key to our success The deadline for returning this survey is April We appreciate your participation inquisiteQuarterlySurveyMarchQuarterlySurveyMarchhtml
